translations: 练习，实践；（尤指）形成……的习惯（或风俗、传统）；作（恶），施（虐）；从事（尤指医疗和法律）工作；<古>阴谋策划（同 practice）

sentences.sentence: He usually wants to practise his English on me.
sentences.translation: 他通常想跟我练习英语。

sentences.sentence: Practise mental arithmetic when you go out shopping.
sentences.translation: 外出购物时练习一下心算。

sentences.sentence: If you practise speaking English, you'll soon improve.
sentences.translation: 只要你练习说英语，很快就会进步。
